DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Oceania . The aim trial compare safety use pulmonary inhaled human insulin s.c. insulin aspart combine NPH insulin subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Trial Compare Insulin Treatment With Preprandial Inhaled Human Insulin s.c. Insulin Aspart Both Combined With NPH Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes Current treatment insulin regimen Body mass index ( BMI ) 38.0 kg/m2 HbA1c equal 13.0 % Total daily insulin dosage 100 IU/day Current acute chronic pulmonary disease ( exclude asthma ) Recurrent major hypoglycaemia Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require acute treatment Smoker Chest Xray clinically significant abnormality
